#BlackMagicCraft #Episode201 #CHALLENGE

BIG THANKS TO EASY ROLLER DICE CO. FOR SPONSORING THIS VID
Check out their Color Splatter Dice Kickstarter: www.easyrollerdice.com/BMC

Check out @Midwinter Minis challenge video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1SoaGiId6mo

Be sure to check out @Lukes Aps - Geek Gaming Scenics range at: https://www.geekgaming.co.uk/

In this video I rise to a challenge placed upon my by the guy himself, @Midwinter Minis . He challenged me to build some grimdark scatter terrain for Warhammer 40k, and I obliged! Seriously, this was a super fun project and I challenge YOU to give it a go yourself!
